title: Dover Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2022 Results - PR Newswire
summary: Dover, a diversified global manufacturer, announced its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year 2022, reporting revenue growth and margin improvements driven by execution and price-cost dynamics. The company enters 2023 with a positive outlook and expects revenue growth and margin accretion. Dover focuses on enhancing productivity, efficiency measures, and capital deployment to drive shareholder value.

title: Kohler Co. Appoints Laura Kohler as Company's First Chief Sustainability and DEI Officer - PR Newswire

green_product: TRUE. Kohler Co.'s emphasis on developing environmentally friendly products, promoting transparency, and fostering sustainability initiatives aligns with the definition of green products focusing on reducing environmental impact throughout the product life cycle.
